channel.title: Soup on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Soup on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: sweet potato cauliflower soup recipe
item.description: Some sweet potato cauliflower soup recipes: Allyson Kramer likes hers with a bit of garam masala: http://www.allysonkramer.com/2011/10/sweet-potato-cauliflower-soup/ Our Three Peas wants carrots and celery and chicken stock: http://ourthreepeas.com/sweet-potato-cauliflower-soup/ Food.com and “Kelly in TO” calls for curry and cinnamon: http://www.food.com/recipe/cauliflower-sweet-potato-curry-soup-246992 Our meal plan pairs this with biscuits and kale, and it was delicious!
